## aads campaigns create

Create a campaign

```
aads campaigns create [flags]
```

### Options

```
      --adam-id int           App Adam ID
      --budget string         Total budget amount
      --countries string      Comma-separated country codes
      --daily-budget string   Daily budget amount
      --from-json string      JSON input (inline, @file, or @- for stdin)
  -h, --help                  help for create
      --name string           Campaign name
      --status string         ENABLED or PAUSED
```
